old_password.title: Your Old Password
old_password.description: Enter your old password to change it

new_password.title: Your New Password
new_password.description: Use this password to log in to your account

name.title: Your Name
name.description: You will be addressed by this name in emails and on the website

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.description: Changing the password will log you out of all devices, and you'll need to log in again with the new password

send_to_email.title: Send Notifications to Email
send_to_email.description: Enable/Disable all notification settings with this option

email.title: Email
email.description: Email to which notifications will be sent

dont_disturb.title: Do Not Disturb Between
dont_disturb.description: Time range during which no notifications will be sent

high_humidity.title: High Air Humidity
high_humidity.description: Notification will be sent at increased humidity

low_humidity.title: Low Air Humidity
low_humidity.description: Notification will be sent at low humidity

high_weight_hive.title: High Hive Weight
high_weight_hive.description: Notification will be sent at high hive weight
high_weight_hive.high_weight_threshold: High weight threshold for the hive

light_weight_hive.title: Low Hive Weight
light_weight_hive.description: Notification will be sent at low hive weight
light_weight_hive.light_weight_threshold: Low weight threshold for the hive

battery_low.title: Hive Battery
battery_low.detail: Notification will be sent at low battery

statuses.WIFI_CONNECTION_FAILED: Incorrect password or error connecting to WiFi
statuses.DEVICE_NOT_FOUND: Sensor or other device not found
